body: The net effect of all of that is that we won't have _any_ data after 9/26 from versions of Firefox less than some threshold which I don't know, but is no less than Firefox 43.0.1.
body_text: The net effect of all of that is that we won't have any data after 9/26 from versions of Firefox less than some threshold which I don't know, but is no less than Firefox 43.0.1.
body_html: The net effect of all of that is that we won't have any data after 9/26 from versions of Firefox less than some threshold which I don't know, but is no less than Firefox 43.0.1.
